body.p: By requiring an entity to apply the amendments as if those amendments had been included in IFRS 15 at the date of initial application, the IASB observed that:

li.p: if the entity applies both IFRS 15 and Clarifications to IFRS 15 at the same time, any effect of applying the amendments would be reflected in the effects of initially applying IFRS 15.

if the entity applies Clarifications to IFRS 15 after the date of initial application of IFRS 15, the effects of initially applying IFRS 15 would be restated for the effects, if any, of initially applying the amendments.
